roleset.name: make shorter, especially words

role.descr: start state of arg 1, original word
end state of arg 1, new abbreviation

roleset.note: Based on Stratified data. Comparison to abbreviate.01. Abbreviate.01 is a member of VN class other_cos-45.4. No FN class. Framed by Katie.

example.name: almost all args
example.text: His abbreviation of urethral catheter out to UCO was confused for urinary catheter out.
